snippet: A Miami man has been charged with wire fraud in connection with a scam that yielded millions of dollars from investors and a premium ticket package for the Miami Heat NBA basketball team, prosecutors said on Friday....

headline.print_headline: Man Charged With Wire Fraud in $1 Million Miami Heat Ticket Scam
headline.main: Man Charged With Wire Fraud in $1 Million Miami Heat Ticket Scam

lead_paragraph: A Miami man has been charged with wire fraud in connection with a scam that yielded millions of dollars from investors and a premium ticket package for the Miami Heat NBA basketball team, prosecutors said on Friday.
